text: Baltasar Corrada del Río (April 10, 1935 – March 11, 2018) was a Puerto Rican politician. He served as Resident Commissioner (1977–1985), Mayor of the capital city of San Juan (1985–1989), Puerto Rico's 15th Secretary of State (1993–1995) and Associate Justice of the Supreme Court (1995–2005). He was also the unsuccessful NPP candidate for Governor in the elections of 1988. Del Río died in Fort Myers, Florida of Alzheimer's disease on March 11, 2018 at the age of 82.Fallece Baltasar Corrada del Río, exjuez del Tribunal Supremo ==References== ==Other websites== * Hispanic Americans in Congress: Corrada del Río * * Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Florida Category:Puerto Rican lawyers Category:Judges Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Mayors of San Juan, Puerto Rico Category:Resident commissioners of Puerto Rico Category:Secretaries of state of Puerto Rico
title: Baltasar Corrada del Río
